short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A new tab chrome extension with mind refreshing links and Bing search bar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stuck in your emails all day?! 
Need a break?!
Clear your mind on any new tab with exciting articles.
When opening a new tab, a list of links to trigger your mind will open up. Links of top world news and other exciting genres.

The new tab embeds a search bar. Search features are provided by Microsoft Bing. No changes to your browser default search settings will be made.

By installing Mind Fresheners extension, you agree to the Terms of service and the Privacy Policy elaborated on Mind Fresheners website:

All images on the website and extension are royalty free.
